changes.message: Changes successfully saved. Check your Gmail.

extDescription.message: Gmelius customizes Gmail's interface to your liking and strips away the ads. Featured on TechCrunch, Lifehacker and other high-profile technology sites.

extName.message: Gmelius - Ad Blocker and Better UI for Gmail™

footbugs.message: Feel free to leave your feedback, suggestions and bugs. Please always include the operating system, Chrome version and Gmelius version you're using when sharing a bug, eg: Mac - Chrome 18 - Gmelius 5.1.

footsettings.message: You can access and modify your preferences whenever you want either by clicking on the icon of the extension at the right of the address bar or by typing "gmelius options" in the address bar. It's that easy!

footupdate.message: Please Ensure to always have the latest version of Gmelius installed. To update your extension, check "developer mode" and click on "Update extensions now". Updates are announced via

h4space.message: Regain some space in your Gmail™

iconstxt.message: In your Gmail inbox, attachements are indicated by a paperclip. What if different icons were shown depending on the type of file attached to your emails? More than 40 types of files currently supported.

lattleft.description: Move attachment icons from the right to the left or your inbox.
lattleft.message: Move attachment icons from the right to the left or your inbox

lbacktop.message: Auto-Scroll to the top of your inbox à la Google+ by clicking on top dark-grey bar

lbtnnav.description: Add text to navigation icons such as Archive, Spam, Delete.
lbtnnav.message: Add text to navigation icons such as "Archive", "Spam", "Delete"

lcoloriz.description: Colourize navigation icons such as Archive, Spam, Delete, etc.
lcoloriz.message: Colourize navigation icons such as "Archive", "Spam", "Delete", etc.

ldefrow.description: Enable subtle row highlight when mouse over your emails.
ldefrow.message: Enable subtle row highlight when mouse over your emails

lfonts.description: Homogenize the appearance of your incoming emails.
lfonts.message: Homogenize the appearance of your incoming emails, ie default font/size/color

lheader.message: Make header (ie search block and logo) auto-expandable

linbox.description: Go back to Inbox by clicking on the Google logo.
linbox.message: Go back to Inbox by clicking on the Google logo

lkey.description: Keys to press to make header visible/hidden.
lkey.message: Keys to press to make header visible/hidden:

llabelsr.description: Move labels of your messages from the left to the right of your inbox.
llabelsr.message: Move labels of your messages from the left to the right of your inbox

lmouse.description: scrollbars and scroll Gmail with mouse wheel/touchpad.
lmouse.message: scrollbars and scroll Gmail with mouse wheel/touchpad

lovetxt.message: Please help supporting the development of Gmelius by making a small contribution.

lplayy.description: Remove Google Play from the top nav bar.
lplayy.message: Remove Google Play from the top nav bar

lreader.description: Replace Google News by Google Reader in the top nav bar.
lreader.message: Replace Google News by Google Reader in the top nav bar

lrow.description: Enable subtle row highlight with customized color.
lrow.message: Enable subtle row highlight with customized color

lvoice.description: Add Google Voice to top navigation bar.
lvoice.message: Add Google Voice to top navigation bar

spacetxt.message: Gmelius gives you the possibility to regain some space and to clean your inbox by removing or disabling:

tip.message: Tick to activate a feature. Don't forget to save your settings.

into your language »

welcome.message: Thanks for using Gmelius! We propose a software of quality by releasing new features and correcting possible bugs on a constant basis. Knowing this, it is highly recommended to follow Gmelius on your favorite social network to be kept updated.
